__comment__: this is an extension of the JSON schema document and includes 'default' specifier

hours_per_day.help: The number of good observing hours per day

obs_duration.help: The time assigned to a single LST bin, by default the time it takes for a source to travel through the beam's FWHM.

integration_time.help: The amount of time integrated into a single visibility

n_channels.help: Number of channels used in the observation.

bandwidth.help: The bandwidth used for the observation, assumed to be in MHz

n_days.help: The number of days observed (for the same set of LSTs).

bl_min.help: Set the minimum baseline (in meters) to include in the uv plane.

bl_max.help: Set the maximum baseline (in meters) to include in the uv plane

redundancy_tol.help: The number of decimal places to which baseline vectors must match (in all dimensions) to be considered redundant.

coherent.help: Whether to add different baselines coherently if they are not instantaneously redundant

spectral_index.help: The spectral index of the foreground model.

tsky_amplitude.help: The temperature of foregrounds at `tsky_ref_freq`. See `spectral_index`.

tsky_ref_freq.help: Frequency at which the foreground model is equal to `tsky_amplitude`.
